name: spam-v1
body: whatsapp support team, I want to appeal against the blocking of my whatsapp account number due to spam. I want the whatsapp support team to re-check my number [ +62xxx ] because I have never felt like I have committed any violations made by whatsapp. I am sure this is just a mistake in blocking. I want my whatsapp account to restored as soon as possible, thank you.

name: spam-v2
body: Привет, добрый день, WhatsApp, моя учетная запись WhatsApp была заблокирована вами, и я не могу получить доступ к своей учетной записи WhatsApp. Я не понимаю, почему мою учетную запись WhatsApp часто временно блокируют.Пожалуйста, помогите немедленно разблокировать мою учетную запись WhatsApp. Спасибо [ +62xxx ]

name: spam-v3
body: Good afternoon Mark Zuckerberg, I would like to ask for help from the esteemed WhatsApp Business team. I accidentally spammed someone else and my WhatsApp account was blocked. My funds want to file a complaint for the removal of the blocking of my WhatsApp account as soon as possible. Please help me restore my WhatsApp account as soon as possible with my WhatsApp account number. [ +62xxx ].
